name: That Time in Jack's Basement
description:
A short VR survival game. 

A child remembers the time they were trapped in their friend's basement, and the horrible experience within.

Developed to work with Oculus Quest 2 (may work on other headsets, but not tested)

Download and sideload the APK if you want to play on Quest 2 standalone

Download and unzip the zip file for a version that should work through steamVR

This project was built with Unity and uses the following assets

VR Interaction Toolkit 

Synty Polygon Packs (Office, Gang Warfare, FX, Knights, Heist)

Infinty PBR Spiders

Playmaker

Horror Elements (sounds effects and ambient music)

Scifi Sounds
